ygData.subject: Patrolling
ygData.msgSnippet: Ultra Magnus revved up his engines as he climbed up a slope. He was worried about not receiving any news of the outpost and he hoped nothing would happen. Not

Ultra Magnus revved up his engines as he climbed up a slope. He was
worried=
 about not receiving any news of the outpost and he hoped
nothing would hap=
pen. Not that he was afraid, but he didn't dare to
think about the implicat=
ions of what he could think of.

Ultra Magnus: Alright, Venomia, I think it=
's no use to try to get them
to speak to us anymore. We're finished in this=
 part of town and we're
heading there straight away. Just... be prepared. I=
 don't like that
much...
